contribution.title: Min-Bias Models - The modeling of SD, DD, and ND

contribution.abstract: - First assessment of the inputs from the available LHC data - Overview of additional observables providing inputs for the understanding of MB data: correlations (pT versus Nchg, etc), forward observables, input from TOTEM, etc.

session.title: Modeling of MB and diffraction: Impact of MC modeling on the extraction of luminosity from MB triggers

On the characterisation of the underlying event
